title: Nylea's Disciple: notification does not show how much life is gained

comments.body: I always try and place an indicator for X, however sometimes X may change from when a spell is cast, to when it resolves. There's currently no way to replace something that goes onto the stack/log
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body:
Nylea's Disciple is devotion based, but you could always cast a green flash creature flash creature, so devotion would change between time of casting and the moment it resolves.

so, if that is currently not possible, then okay, I won't mention these again.
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

comments.body: Just realised that Search cards use game.logAppend to add the card that's found. Will see if this acts as expected if there's other items on the stack. (ie. Only appends the card's own entry, not another spell/effect by the same player)
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body:
game.logAppendMessage(<player>,<message>); works.

Nylea's Disciple been amended. (Haven't used an 'X=', as there's no X definition on the card, just an amount - but will still aid with log info).

**Status:** Fixed
